item.title: Is Intuitive User Interface Design Actually Subjective
item.description: I have been using Microsoft Essentials as my antivirus program ever since it was released. I really like the clean and simple user interface and the small memory footprint. I also recommend it to everyone. However recently I noticed that I hadnâ€™t run a system scan in a while and the Microsoft Essential icon had turned yellow.
